## Data
The data was taken from [this Kaggle Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/thedevastator/books-sales-and-ratings/data). I also used Chat GPT for help in creating this website.

## Kaggle
Kaggle is a data science community with platforms for data science competitions, comphrehensive datasets, and tutorials and free AI/ML models for users to develop skills in data science.
